name: Video and Sound
description: Students explore the use of sound and video to investigate contemporary approaches to the production of time-based artwork. Students work with analogue and digital editing processes, live sound performance, site-specific soundworks, single-channel video, video installation, and will develop a professional portfolio website. [144P]
prerequisites: FAS143H5, FAS145H5, FAS147H5, FAS232H5, FAS236H5, FAS248H5, and 1.5 credits in FAH/VCC/VST and P.I.
